sentences.sentence: He gave her a drink spiked with tranquillizers.
sentences.translation: 他给了她一杯偷偷放了镇静剂的饮料。

sentences.sentence: I've tried to get him to come off the tranquillizers.
sentences.translation: 我试图说服他停止服用镇静剂。

sentences.sentence: Take one of the tranquillizers; it will settle your nerves.
sentences.translation: 吃一片镇定药吧，它会安定你的神经。
